flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
地中　深くで　生まれる　ヨーギラスは
土を　食べ尽くして　地上へ　出ないと
親の　顔を　見る　ことが　できないのだ。

Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the
surface, this Pokémon must eat its way through the soil above.
Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.

Larvitar nasce nelle viscere della terra. Per emergere
in superficie deve farsi strada inghiottendo la terra che
lo ostacola. Larvitar non può vedere il volto dei propri
genitori finché non emerge.

Larvitar nace bajo tierra a gran profundidad. Para subir a la
superficie, este Pokémon debe comer lo que encuentra en su
camino para abrirse paso. Y, hasta que no está arriba, no
puede verles la cara a sus padres.

Larvitar wurde tief unter der Erde geboren. Um an die
Oberfläche zu gelangen, muss es sich durch das Erdreich
fressen. Erst dann bekommt es seine Eltern zu Gesicht.

Embrylex est né sous terre. Pour remonter à la surface,
ce Pokémon doit manger la terre au-dessus de lui.
Jusqu’à ce qu’il y parvienne, Embrylex ne peut pas voir
le visage de ses parents.

땅속 깊은 곳에서 태어나는 애버라스는
흙을 먹어치우고 지상에 나오지 않으면
부모의 얼굴을 볼 수가 없다.

ちちゅう　ふかくで　うまれる　ヨーギラスは
つちを　たべつくして　ちじょうへ　でないと
おやの　かおを　 る　ことが　できないのだ。

地中　深くで　生まれる　ヨーギラスは
土を　食べ尽くして　地上へ　出ないと
親の　顔を　見る　ことが　できないのだ。

Larvitar is born deep under the ground. To come up to the
surface, this Pokémon must eat its way through the soil above.
Until it does so, Larvitar cannot see its parents.

Larvitar nasce nelle viscere della terra. Per emergere
in superficie deve farsi strada inghiottendo la terra che
lo ostacola. Larvitar non può vedere il volto dei propri
genitori finché non emerge.

Larvitar nace bajo tierra a gran profundidad. Para subir a la
superficie, este Pokémon debe comer lo que encuentra en su
camino para abrirse paso. Y, hasta que no está arriba, no
puede verles la cara a sus padres.

Larvitar wurde tief unter der Erde geboren. Um an die
Oberfläche zu gelangen, muss es sich durch das Erdreich
fressen. Erst dann bekommt es seine Eltern zu Gesicht.

Embrylex est né sous terre. Pour remonter à la surface,
ce Pokémon doit manger la terre au-dessus de lui.
Jusqu’à ce qu’il y parvienne, Embrylex ne peut pas voir
le visage de ses parents.

땅속 깊은 곳에서 태어나는 애버라스는
흙을 먹어치우고 지상에 나오지 않으면
부모의 얼굴을 볼 수가 없다.

ちちゅう　ふかくで　うまれる　ヨーギラスは
つちを　たべつくして　ちじょうへ　でないと
おやの　かおを　 る　ことが　できないのだ。

地底　奥深くで　生まれる。
まわりの　土を　たいらげると
地上に　現われ　サナギになる。

Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and
becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the
surrounding soil.

Nasce nelle profondità del sottosuolo. Dopo aver
divorato la terra circostante emerge in superficie e
diventa crisalide.

Nace muy profundo en el suelo y sube a la superficie,
donde se convierte en una larva comiéndose la tierra
que lo rodea.

Sie schlüpfen tief unter der Erde und fressen sich
durch das Erdreich bis zur Oberfläche durch,
wo sie sich verpuppen.

Il vit très profond sous terre. Il n’en sort pour évoluer
qu’après avoir dévoré tout ce qui l’entourait.

땅속 깊은 곳에서 태어난다.
주변의 흙을 다 먹으면
지상으로 올라와 번데기가 된다.

ちてい　おくふかくで　うまれる。
まわりの　つちを　たいらげると
ちじょうに　あらわれ　サナギになる。

土を　食べて　生きている。
大きな　山ひとつ　食べ終わると
成長のため　眠りはじめる。

It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain,
it falls asleep so it can grow.

Si nutre di terra. Dopo aver divorato una montagna
intera, si addormenta per poter crescere.

Se alimenta de tierra. Después de comer una gran
montaña, se duerme y empieza a crecer.

Es ernährt sich von Erde. Nachdem es einen Berg
verspeist hat, schläft es ein, um zu wachsen.

Il se nourrit de terre. Une fois qu’il a absorbé une
montagne, il s’endort et commence à évoluer.

흙을 먹으며 살고 있다.
큰 산을 하나 다 먹으면
성장을 위해 잠자기 시작한다.

つちを　たべて　いきている。
おおきな　やまひとつ　たべおわると
せいちょうのため　ねむりはじめる。

Born deep underground, it comes
aboveground and becomes a pupa once it
has finished eating the surrounding soil.

Born deep underground, it comes
aboveground and becomes a pupa once it
has finished eating the surrounding soil.

A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it
has eaten a large mountain, it
goes to sleep so it can grow.

Un Pokémon qui se nourrit de terre.
Après avoir dévoré une montagne,
il s’endort pour grandir.

A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it
has eaten a large mountain, it
goes to sleep so it can grow.

Un Pokémon qui se nourrit de terre.
Après avoir dévoré une montagne,
il s’endort pour grandir.

It is born deep underground. It
can’t emerge until it has entirely
consumed the soil around it.

It feeds on soil. After it has eaten
a large mountain, it falls asleep
so it can grow.

A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it
has eaten a large mountain, it
goes to sleep so it can grow.

A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it
has eaten a large mountain, it
goes to sleep so it can grow.

A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it
has eaten a large mountain, it
goes to sleep so it can grow.

It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a
large mountain, it will fall asleep so it
can grow.

It is born deep underground. It can’t
emerge until it has entirely consumed the
soil around it.

A LARVITAR is born deep under the ground.
It must eat its way through the soil above
and reach the surface for it to see its
parents’ faces.

LARVITAR is born deep under the ground.
To come up to the surface, this POKéMON
must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, LARVITAR cannot see
its parent’s face.

LARVITAR is born deep under the ground.
To come up to the surface, this POKéMON
must eat its way through the soil above. Until it does so, LARVITAR cannot see
its parent’s face.

Born deep under­
ground, this
POKéMON becomes a pupa after eating
enough dirt to
make a mountain.

It is born deep
underground. It
can't emerge until it has entirely
consumed the soil
around it.

It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.
